name: Lottery Center Simulator
description:
Hello, This is a game about Lottery Center. In this game, You will act the administrator of a lottery center.
There is a city in this game. In this city, lotteries can only be saled by the government. The Lottery Center is responsible for it. You will act the administrator of the Lottery Center. Your goal is earn more money to develop the city in order to imporve the life of the citizen, and at the same time, you can not let the lottery center go broke.
The main of this game includes two parts, sales the lotteries and develop the city.
In Part I, you can build the lottery shop, sales lotteries, do business cooperation and so on. You can build all kinds of lottery shop, includes own by yours or grant the third-party enterprises. You can sales numeric type and scratch-open ticket.
In Part II, you can build the shopping mall, school, hospital and so on. Of course, what should be build is depend you. However, inappropriate buildings will let the lottery center go broke.
Please attention, You should not do some things in this game. In this case, the sales volume will fall. Although you can save the lottery center though some methods, it is hard very much.
